title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 4
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>An interview for the Shuffle Festival?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes, we’re doing one in a relay format. So, Karin-san, please tell us how you feel about the upcoming Shuffle Festival.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I think I’m a little nervous being given a chance to sing everyone else’s songs. I don’t know how my approach will turn out, and I also don’t know what the people who have supported me so far will think. But I’m practicing with the intention of satisfying them all no matter what. Also, I’m really interested in how someone else will sing my song.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It’s a little unexpected for you to be nervous, Karin-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, even I feel those things, you know. But getting through those feelings is the fun part.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>So, in other words, your nervousness spices things up for you....? What a complicated way to have fun....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>So this is the mouth that’s been spewing out bad things about me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hyowowowow.... I’m sowwy~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, as long as you understand.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Maybe you aren’t that nervous after all, Karin-san....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
